legacyCollection.name: Europe
legacyCollection.longDescription: The latest news, analysis and investigations from Europe.

headline.default: In a first, a Russian soldier will stand trial in Ukraine on war crimes charges.

node.summary: A 21-year-old Russian soldier is accused of following orders to shoot an unarmed cyclist four days into Russia’s invasion of Ukraine.

headline.default: In the Trenches of Eastern Ukraine, Combat Becomes a Vicious Dance

node.summary: In some villages along the front, Ukrainian and Russian soldiers face off at close quarters, sometimes within eyesight of one another.

headline.default: The Ukraine War’s Economic Toll Is Testing the West’s Unity Against Russia

node.summary: Russia’s president is calculating that Western leaders will tire before he does of a protracted struggle in Ukraine, especially if the price is turbocharged inflation and energy shortages.

headline.default: Lufthansa Apologizes After Jewish People Were Barred From Flight

node.summary: Passengers said that after landing in Germany, more than 100 people were blocked from boarding a connecting flight to Hungary, after a handful of passengers disobeyed a mask requirement.

headline.default: To Keep Putin and His Oligarchs Afloat, It Takes a System

node.summary: Out of a halting attempt at democratization grew a corrupt ecosystem that has proved very difficult for the Russian elite to resist.
